Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Vue in DEV mode in production environment." (#7312) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version 2.5.13 ### Reproduction link [https://jsfiddle.net/esrgxLfu/](https://jsfiddle.net/esrgxLfu/) ### Steps to reproduce I have a PHP application which uses Vue JS mainly for the settings page. All of settings is created with Vue and we use Webpack. Everything works fine and when we are in the live version there is no console error about Vue being in development mode. We use Vue also for only one component on the dashboard page. It is a Vue TODO list like the one in the Vue documentation. On the dashboard page, we get the console message that Vue is in development mode. We use same Webpack for dashboard and settings page hence the same settings. I have looked for hours to try to find an answer but I have not been successful which is why I am creating this issue. In the php file we have this to place the vue component in: `
` and then we included the javascript file plus the variables. You can see everything that's being used in the fiddle but I really don't think I can make this reproducible, I'm sorry if you cannot help me with this but it is using a bunch of stuff from PHP Symfony and twig so I was not sure what I could do. ### What is expected? Vue to be in production mode. ### What is actually happening? Vue is in dev environment.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "Vue in DEV mode in production environment." (#7312) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version 2.5.13 ### Reproduction link [https://jsfiddle.net/esrgxLfu/](https://jsfiddle.net/esrgxLfu/) ### Steps to reproduce I have a php application which uses Vue JS mainly for the settings page. All of settings is created with vue and we use webpack. Everything works fine and when we are in the live version there is no console error about vue being in development mode. We use vue also for only one component on the dashboard page. It is a vue TODO list like the one in the vue documentation. On the dashboard page, we get the console message that vue is in dev mode. We use same webpack for dashboard and settings page hence the same settings. I have looked for hours to try to find an answer but I have not been successful which is why I am creating this issue. In the php file we have this to place the vue component in: `
` and then we included the javascript file plus the variables. You can see everything that's being used in the fiddle but I really dont think I can make this reproducable, Im sorry if you cannot help me with this but it is using a bunch of stuff from php symfony and twig so I was not sure what I could do. ### What is expected? Vue to be in production mode. ### What is actually happening? Vue is in dev environment.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue ""slot-scope" name is very misleading, true and clearer name is "slot-props"" (#7307) at vuejs/vue
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
This rename will reduce needless confusion around using slots.   The current name "slot-scope" is rather misleading because "scope" is the wrong concept to suggest; particularly given Angular's use of scope.  The true and correct concept is "props".    My suggested name change, will render current developer confusions moot.    You will have less explaining (and developer questions) to answer.

I know a 2nd rename is gross, but it will help make learning Vue easier.

### What does the proposed API look like?
Add slot-props (alias) for slot-scope, prefer "slot-props" in documentation.   deprecate the spelling "slot-scope"

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "the beforeRouteLeave event of vue's first component is not trigger" (#1951) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/gahing/c61ng9of/7/](https://jsfiddle.net/gahing/c61ng9of/7/)

### Steps to reproduce
（1）open https://jsfiddle.net/gahing/c61ng9of/7/ 

（2）Press the back button of the browser immediately

（3）Or wait for 2S ,browser will alert('main beforeRouteLeave happened')




my english is poor , that is chinese version as follows:

(1)打开该网址

(2)立刻按浏览器的后退按钮

(3)或者等待2s 出现alert弹框('main beforeRouteLeave happened')

### What is expected?
When 'Main' component is mounted，and the function of setTimeout is not happened,Press the back button of the browser immediately. I
 wish that the beforeRouteLeave event is triggered.

### What is actually happening?
It is not happen。bug when the code "this.$router.push('/user')" run, will trigger beforeRouteLeave

---
now, my solution is add component named 'BeforeMain' before Main component.
when BeforeMain'mounted trigger,run  "this.$router.push({name:'main'})"
Add 'beforeEach':
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
  // gameview的
  if (to.name === 'beforemain' && from.name === 'main') {
    router.go(-1)
    next(false)
  } else {
    next()
  }
})
Thus,while current component is 'Main' ,you press back button of brower, you can trigger 'beforeRouteLeave'
But , it 's so trouble


Chinese version:
将第一个组件前再增加一个beforemain组件，做一次push跳转。这样main可以正常触发beforeRouteLeave

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "URL&Router not changed when use route params" (#1950) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
3.0.1

### Reproduction link
[https://jsfiddle.net/qdechochen/L7hscd8h/3310/](https://jsfiddle.net/qdechochen/L7hscd8h/3310/)

### Steps to reproduce
1. click /user/foo/profile1 OK
2. click /user/foo/profile2 : content changed, but URL not changed if you run this directly in a browser.
3. click /user/foo/profile1:  nothing happend
4. click /user/foo OK
5. click /user/foo/profile2 OK
6. click /user/foo/profile1:  content changed, but URL not changed if you run this directly in a browser.
7. click /user/foo/profile2:  nothing happend





### What is expected?
1. In step 2, URL should be changed to /user/foo/profile2
2. in step 3, beforeRouteUpdate should be called.

For step 6 & 7, same thing.

### What is actually happening?
Maybe it's because the URL not change in step 2, beforeRouteUpdate is not called?

<!-- generated by vue-issues. DO NOT REMOVE -->

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "微信路由切换url哈希值不正确" (#1949) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### Version
2.5.3

### Reproduction link
[http://app.whipo.net/Html/webSignUp/index.html](http://app.whipo.net/Html/webSignUp/index.html)

### Steps to reproduce
微信中路由可以正常切换，但是通过复制链接发现实际上的URL是不包含哈希值的，这样一来在微信中选择“在浏览器中打开”，打开的实际上是入口页面。

### What is expected?
在浏览器中打开正确的子页面#/agreement

### What is actually happening?
实际上还是入口页面#/
